tool_description: Deal Cards the way you want!

api_list.name: Get Arrays Of Each Hand (Specifically Distributed)
api_list.description: Retrieve arrays of each hand of cards that are specifically distributed based on the parameters provided.

required_parameters.name: jokerIncluded
required_parameters.description: Indicates whether jokers should be included in the deck.

api_list.name: Get Arrays Of Each Hand (Equally Distributed)
api_list.description: Retrieve arrays of each hand of cards that are equally distributed among the specified number of hands.

required_parameters.name: amountOfCardsEach
required_parameters.description: The number of cards each hand should receive.

required_parameters.name: amountOfHands
required_parameters.description: The total number of hands to be dealt.

required_parameters.name: jokerIncluded
required_parameters.description: Indicates whether jokers should be included in the deck.

api_list.name: Get Array of Each Hand (Distributed Until Out Of Cards)
api_list.description: Retrieve arrays of each hand of cards distributed until there are no cards left.

required_parameters.name: jokerIncluded
required_parameters.description: Indicates whether jokers should be included in the deck.

required_parameters.name: amountOfHands
required_parameters.description: The total number of hands to be dealt.

api_list.name: Get Deck of Cards
api_list.description: Retrieve a complete deck of cards.

required_parameters.name: jokerIncluded
required_parameters.description: Indicates whether jokers should be included in the deck.
